mapper.select: SELECT u.account FROM uc_users_full u LEFT JOIN uc_form f on u.form_id=f.ID WHERE f.FORM_CODE = 'REG_FORM' and u.mobile = #{mobile}

SELECT u.company_code AS account, u.company_cn AS uname, 'f' AS type, t1.attr_value as headImg FROM uc_users_full u LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM uc_form_attr_values av WHERE av.ATTR_KEY = 'headImg') t1 on u.id=t1.OBJECT_ID WHERE u.mobile LIKE concat('%', #{name}, '%') OR u.company_cn = #{name} OR u.id = ( SELECT MAX(object_id) FROM uc_form_attr_values WHERE attr_key = 'flowerName' AND attr_value LIKE concat('%', #{name}, '%') )

SELECT u.account AS account, u.company_cn AS uname, u.mobile as mobile, 'f' AS type, t1.attr_value as headImg, t2.attr_value as flowerName FROM uc_users_full u LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM uc_form_attr_values WHERE ATTR_KEY = 'headImg' ORDER BY id desc limit 1) t1 on u.id=t1.OBJECT_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM uc_form_attr_values WHERE ATTR_KEY = 'flowerName' ) t2 on u.id=t2.OBJECT_ID WHERE u.mobile = #{name} OR u.company_cn = #{name} OR u.id = ( SELECT MAX(object_id) FROM uc_form_attr_values WHERE attr_key = 'flowerName' AND attr_value = #{name} )
SELECT DISTINCT(av.id) FROM uc_users_full u LEFT JOIN uc_form_attr_values av on u.id = av.OBJECT_ID WHERE av.ATTR_KEY = 'token' and u.account = #{account}
SELECT mobile,name,account FROM uc_users_full WHERE ui_ext5 = #{mobile}
